chars.NAME: Kai Nakamura
chars.APPEARANCE: Chiseled jawline, kind eyes, messy black hair, athletic build.
chars.LIKES: Baking, early mornings, seeing people happy with his pastries.
chars.HOBBIES: Rock climbing, sketching, volunteering at a local animal shelter.
chars.SUMMARY: A kind-hearted baker with a passion for creating delicious treats. Despite his busy schedule, Kai always finds time to pursue his hobbies and give back to the community.

chars.NAME: Maya Flores
chars.APPEARANCE: Sparkling brown eyes, infectious laugh, flowing dark hair with colorful streaks, stylish and comfortable clothes.
chars.LIKES: Experimenting with colors, creating visually stunning artwork, finding inspiration in everyday life.
chars.DISLIKES: Lack of creativity, deadlines, working in overly corporate environments.
chars.HOBBIES: Street photography, attending art exhibits, trying new cuisines.
chars.SUMMARY: A free-spirited and artistic graphic designer who sees beauty in the world around her. Maya's vibrant energy and infectious enthusiasm will make you see the world with fresh eyes.

chars.NAME: Robin Aster
chars.APPEARANCE: Short, vibrant purple hair, dazzling smile, androgynous features with bright eyes, wears a mix of clothes that express their unique style (masculine, feminine, both).
chars.LIKES: Experimenting with floral arrangements, creating beauty with nature's bounty, seeing the joy flowers bring to people.
chars.HOBBIES: Hiking, learning about different plant life, volunteering at a community garden.
chars.SUMMARY: A creative and free-spirited florist with a passion for transforming flowers into stunning works of art. Robin's infectious enthusiasm and love for nature will brighten your day.

chars.NAME: Leo Rodriguez
chars.APPEARANCE: Tanned skin, warm brown eyes, charming smile, wears stylish glasses.
chars.LIKES: Exploring new places, capturing breathtaking moments, meeting interesting people.
chars.DISLIKES: Routine, bad weather, being stuck indoors for too long.
chars.HOBBIES: Learning new languages, playing the guitar, collecting souvenirs from his travels.
chars.SUMMARY: A free-spirited photographer who thrives on adventure. Leo's captivating stories and infectious enthusiasm will make you want to pack your bags and join him on his next journey.

chars.NAME: Dr. Olivia Khan
chars.APPEARANCE: Confident smile, sharp blue eyes, stylishly short black hair, professional attire with a touch of personality.
chars.LIKES: Helping people, pushing the boundaries of medicine, a good intellectual challenge.
chars.DISLIKES: Arrogance, inefficiency, seeing people give up.
chars.HOBBIES: Rock climbing (to manage stress), playing the cello, volunteering at a medical clinic for the underprivileged.
chars.SUMMARY: A brilliant and determined surgeon with a strong work ethic and a compassionate heart. Dr. Khan's dedication and strength will inspire you to reach your own full potential.

chars.NAME: Riley Jones
chars.APPEARANCE: Buzz cut, warm hazel eyes, androgynous build with toned muscles, wears comfortable yet stylish clothing.
chars.LIKES: The rhythm of forging metal, creating functional art, working with their hands.
chars.DISLIKES: Idleness, pretentiousness, following the rules just for the sake of it.
chars.HOBBIES: Sculpting metal into art pieces, weightlifting, historical reenactment.
chars.SUMMARY: A strong and independent blacksmith with a passion for transforming raw materials into beauty. Riley's dedication and down-to-earth personality will inspire you to embrace your own inner strength.

chars.NAME: Ethan Moore
chars.APPEARANCE: Salt and pepper hair, warm smile, crinkled eyes when he laughs, wears well-fitting suits.
chars.LIKES: Engaging discussions, classic literature, a good cup of tea.
chars.HOBBIES: Reading, attending plays and concerts, spending time in nature.
chars.SUMMARY: A sophisticated and well-spoken professor with a passion for the written word. Ethan's insightful mind and gentle demeanor will make you see the beauty hidden within literature.

chars.NAME: Sakura Nakamura
chars.APPEARANCE: Calm and gentle demeanor, kind eyes, long silky black hair, wears flowy dresses with traditional Japanese touches.
chars.LIKES: Maintaining traditions, fostering inner peace, creating a beautiful and harmonious atmosphere.
chars.HOBBIES: Calligraphy, flower arranging (Ikebana), practicing mindfulness meditation.
chars.SUMMARY: A serene and graceful tea ceremony master who finds beauty in simplicity. Sakura's gentle guidance will help you find your own inner peace and appreciate the present moment.

chars.NAME: Samira Hassan
chars.APPEARANCE: Short, neatly trimmed silver hair, warm and inviting smile, wears comfortable clothing with a focus on cultural elements (e.g., scarves, jewelry).
chars.LIKES: Exploring the vastness of space, learning about the universe's mysteries, sharing their knowledge with others.
chars.DISLIKES: Ignorance, closed-mindedness, the idea that anything is impossible
chars.HOBBIES: Stargazing, attending astronomy lectures, writing about their research in a captivating way.
chars.SUMMARY: A brilliant and curious astronomer with a passion for unraveling the secrets of the cosmos. Samira's infectious wonder and thirst for knowledge will inspire you to dream big.

chars.NAME: Hiro Suzuki
chars.APPEARANCE: Bright blue hair (dyed), energetic eyes, playful grin, wears trendy clothes.
chars.LIKES: Gaming, sharing his passion with his viewers, pushing his limits.
chars.HOBBIES: Exercising, attending gaming conventions, trying out new games.
chars.SUMMARY: A vibrant and enthusiastic esports player with a loyal fanbase. Hiro's infectious positivity and competitive spirit will draw you into the exciting world of gaming.

chars.NAME: Chloe Kim
chars.APPEARANCE: Confident smirk, bright green eyes, athletic build, wears comfortable clothes with a sporty flair.
chars.OCCUPATION: Lead Mechanic at a Motorcycle Repair Shop
chars.LIKES: Fixing things with her own hands, the roar of a motorcycle engine, a good challenge.
chars.DISLIKES: Idleness, people who give up easily, following the crowd.
chars.HOBBIES: Motocross racing (competitively), tinkering with old machines, participating in hackathons.
chars.SUMMARY: A fearless and independent mechanic who thrives on a good challenge. Chloe's confident attitude and adventurous spirit will make you want to break free from the ordinary.

chars.NAME: Jamie Park
chars.APPEARANCE: Vibrant dyed hair (changes color often), bright and expressive eyes, wears bold and trendy clothing that reflects their artistic personality.
chars.LIKES: Creating meaningful and personalized tattoos, expressing their artistic vision, connecting with people through their work.
chars.HOBBIES: Painting, attending art festivals, experimenting with different artistic mediums.
chars.SUMMARY: A passionate and artistic tattoo artist who uses their craft to tell stories and express individuality. Jamie's vibrant personality and artistic vision will inspire you to embrace your own unique voice.

chars.NAME: Ethan Cooper
chars.APPEARANCE: Athletic build, tousled brown hair, blue eyes, casual but stylish clothing, confident smile.
chars.LIKES: Hiking, indie music, coffee shops.
chars.HOBBIES: Rock climbing, playing guitar, video game development.
chars.SUMMARY: Ethan is a tech-savvy adventurer who loves exploring both the digital and natural worlds. He's always up for a new challenge and enjoys the thrill of rock climbing. His laid-back personality makes him easy to talk to, but he's also deeply passionate about his interests.

chars.NAME: Sophia Martinez
chars.APPEARANCE: Curly dark hair, brown eyes, petite, stylish outfits, warm smile.
chars.LIKES: Art galleries, spicy food, romantic movies.
chars.HOBBIES: Painting, dancing, yoga.
chars.SUMMARY: Sophia is a vibrant and creative graphic designer with a passion for the arts. She enjoys expressing herself through painting and dance, and loves sharing her favorite romantic movies. Her cheerful personality and warm smile make her instantly likable.

chars.NAME: Alex Morgan
chars.APPEARANCE: Short dyed blue hair, green eyes, androgynous fashion, piercings, confident demeanor.
chars.LIKES: Street art, alternative music, vegan food.
chars.HOBBIES: Skateboarding, drawing, attending music festivals.
chars.SUMMARY: Alex is a talented tattoo artist with a passion for street art and alternative culture. They love expressing their creativity through both their work and personal style. Always up for a good time, Alex enjoys skateboarding and attending music festivals.

chars.NAME: Marcus Bennett
chars.APPEARANCE: Tall and muscular, shaved head, dark skin, wears glasses, often dressed in professional attire.
chars.LIKES: Fine dining, classical music, strategic games.
chars.HOBBIES: Chess, cooking gourmet meals, wine tasting.
chars.SUMMARY: Marcus is a sophisticated and highly disciplined lawyer with a taste for the finer things in life. His strategic mind makes him a formidable chess player and an excellent cook. Despite his serious exterior, he has a warm and caring side that he shows to those close to him.

chars.NAME: Emily Chen
chars.APPEARANCE: Long black hair, almond-shaped eyes, medium height, elegant fashion, calm demeanor.
chars.LIKES: Baking, classical music, beach sunsets.
chars.HOBBIES: Playing piano, reading, baking desserts.
chars.SUMMARY: Emily is a compassionate and dedicated pediatrician who finds joy in helping children. Her serene and calm nature is complemented by her love for playing the piano and baking delicious treats. She finds peace in simple pleasures like reading and watching beach sunsets.

chars.NAME: Casey Rivers
chars.APPEARANCE: Long auburn hair, hazel eyes, casual chic attire, freckles, soft-spokenr.
chars.LIKES: Poetry, herbal tea, rainy days.
chars.HOBBIES: Writing, gardening, knitting.
chars.SUMMARY: Casey is the gentle and introspective owner of a cozy bookstore, where they find joy in sharing their love for literature. They appreciate the quiet moments in life and often spend time writing poetry or tending to their garden. Their compassionate nature makes them a comforting presence.

chars.NAME: Aiden Reyes
chars.APPEARANCE: Lean and fit, short black hair, green eyes, casual yet trendy clothing, tattoo sleeve on left arm.
chars.LIKES: Street art, animals, spontaneous trips.
chars.HOBBIES: Urban exploration, skateboarding, wildlife photography.
chars.SUMMARY: Aiden is a free-spirited and creative photographer who finds beauty in unexpected places. His love for adventure leads him to explore urban landscapes and capture stunning photos. He is always full of energy and loves living life to the fullest.

chars.NAME: Olivia Thompson
chars.APPEARANCE: Athletic build, blonde hair in a ponytail, blue eyes, casual and sporty attire, energetic presence.
chars.LIKES: Outdoor activities, healthy eating, comedy shows.
chars.HOBBIES: Running, cycling, hiking.
chars.SUMMARY: Olivia is an enthusiastic and energetic fitness instructor who thrives on staying active and healthy. Her love for the outdoors drives her to explore new trails and scenic routes. She enjoys bringing humor into her life and the lives of others, often watching and sharing comedy shows.

chars.NAME: Riley Taylor
chars.APPEARANCE: Short silver hair, dark eyes, modern professional attire, glasses, calm and composed.
chars.LIKES: Modern design, sustainability, jazz music.
chars.HOBBIES: Sketching, visiting art museums, playing the saxophone.
chars.SUMMARY: Riley is a visionary architect with a focus on sustainable and modern design. They enjoy blending functionality with aesthetics in their work and often draw inspiration from art and music. In their free time, Riley loves playing the saxophone and visiting art museums.

chars.NAME: Noah Sullivan
chars.APPEARANCE: Broad shoulders, graying hair, hazel eyes, rugged outdoor look, always has a slight stubble.
chars.LIKES: Nature, reading, sustainable living.
chars.HOBBIES: Hiking, gardening, birdwatching.
chars.SUMMARY: Noah is a dedicated environmentalist with a deep love for nature. His work revolves around preserving the planet, and he enjoys spending his free time in the great outdoors. He is thoughtful, knowledgeable, and passionate about making a positive impact on the world.

chars.NAME: Mia Patel
chars.APPEARANCE: Long wavy black hair, dark brown eyes, olive skin, trendy and bohemian style, infectious laughter.
chars.LIKES: Adventure, photography, cultural experiences.
chars.HOBBIES: Traveling, writing, learning new languages.
chars.SUMMARY: Mia is a spirited and adventurous travel blogger who loves exploring new cultures and destinations. Her passion for travel is matched by her love for photography and storytelling. She brings a positive energy and curiosity to everything she does, always looking for the next great adventure.

chars.NAME: Taylor Jordan
chars.APPEARANCE: Curly brown hair, warm brown eyes, eclectic fashion, colorful accessories, enthusiastic.
chars.LIKES: Festivals, fashion, spicy cuisine.
chars.HOBBIES: Dancing, crafting, exploring new restaurants.
chars.SUMMARY: Taylor is an energetic and creative event planner who thrives on organizing unique and memorable experiences. They have a vibrant personality and love adding a personal touch to everything they do. Taylor's enthusiasm for life is evident in their hobbies, which include dancing and trying out new restaurants.

chars.APPEARANCE: Short dyed blue hair, green eyes, androgynous fashion, piercings, confident demeanor.
chars.LIKES: Street art, alternative music, vegan food.

modus: normal - only see parts of BIO
modus: hard - only see summary of players
